text: Has anybody had any experience using React to build modules for the marketplace? Is React a viable/recommended option for this?

I’m not sure how many react modules are in the marketplace. I know there’s a theme that heavily uses react though.

Anyhow I think what you should decide based on is - Is react and all that comes with it necessary for what you’re building?

For example - say you’re building just a simple button that when clicked reveals some content.

Loading all of react for that would be pointless overhead.

On the flip side, say you were building a sophisticated pricing and packaging module that calculates the price as the customer marks all of the stuff they need.

That involves some complicated state, and performing math frequently. That may be a good use-case for react.


Basic jist - if you are handling some crazy sophisticated state stuff Yeah, reactjs or VueJS are a great option.

If you’re not - it’s probably not worth it.
